thread.title: Photo: Pau Gasol towers over Cinderella

title: Photo: Pau Gasol towers over Cinderella
text:
Great night at the @lyricopera! A wonderful and very fun production. I think #Cinderella was impressed with my height! #backstage #LyricCinderella #Chicago Gran noche en la @lyricopera! Una ópera fantástica y muy divertida. Creo que #Cenicienta se ha quedado impresionada con mi altura! #Chicago #Opera
A photo posted by Pau (@paugasol) on Oct 4, 2015 at 8:58pm PDT
Bulls center Pau Gasol is a versatile man. For years, he’s been known as a prominent offensive post player but he had his best year defensively in his first season in Chicago.
As dominant as he is on the court, Pau is still able to enjoy cultural activities like Operas.
It’s kind of hard to miss him at an Opera because of his height. I’m not sure if there are a lot of 7-footers that frequent the events, but it must be hard being the person that has to sit behind Gasol.
